_header: All his friends shall be loath
Subjects: dying person, description of; death, approach of
_description: Description of a dying person — eighteen lines in couplets

BLHar7322.First Lines:
Alle his frendes he shal beo loþAnd helud shal ben wiþ
                    acloþ…
BLHar7322.Last Lines:
…þou þat art so proudNe shalt þou haue lute
                    aclout
